item.description: I’ve decided not to run in the Toronto Carnival Run 5k tomorrow. I could transfer my bib to someone, for free. Who would like it? @TOCarnivalRun #TOCarnivalRun #TOCarnivalRun2022 https://t.co/RDSDP5wNrR

item.description: @Katie_Kats1 Yeah, I was confused by that guy too. RATM are no fans of Trudeau, I have no doubt about that, but for different reasons than that guy. If the messaging on the video board during “Freedom” had worked properly tonight, that guy might have learned something.
item.source:markdown: @Katie_Kats1 Yeah, I was confused by that guy too. RATM are no fans of Trudeau, I have no doubt about that, but for different reasons than that guy. If the messaging on the video board during “Freedom” had worked properly tonight, that guy might have learned something.

item.description:
I yelled “WHAT BETTER PLACE THAN NOW?! WHAT BETTER TIME THAN HERE?!“ at the first of the Toronto shows, whoops. https://t.co/vVUSwmxbRC

I might have yelled out “YOUR ANGER IS A GIFT!!” louder than I thought I would.

Zack whispers it on the recording, but pierces it into one’s soul live.

This captures it. https://t.co/YAE4WQ1IwY
item.source:markdown:
I yelled “WHAT BETTER PLACE THAN NOW?! WHAT BETTER TIME THAN HERE?!“ at the first of the Toronto shows, whoops. https://t.co/vVUSwmxbRC
I might have yelled out “YOUR ANGER IS A GIFT!!” louder than I thought I would.
Zack whispers it on the recording, but pierces it into one’s soul live.
This captures it. https://t.co/YAE4WQ1IwY

item.description: @seanorr I’ve faved tweets of yours that, if my political opponents got a hold of those faves, would bury me for. But I’d stand by those faves.

item.description: I wish I knew about the meal kits. The restaurant it turned into is near me, at least, but it would have been a lot of fun to make Indian food with Canadian ingredients. https://t.co/wwD1ZfsSVe
item.source:markdown: I wish I knew about the meal kits. The restaurant it turned into is near me, at least, but it would have been a lot of fun to make Indian food with Canadian ingredients. https://t.co/wwD1ZfsSVe

item.description: @extra_specific Thanks for the extremely specific baseball accounts today. That inspired me to re-activate my bot @AllTimesPacific (a joke on when baseball start times were only expressed in the Eastern Time Zone) soon. It’s not active yet, so don’t suggest it, yet.
item.source:markdown: @extra_specific Thanks for the extremely specific baseball accounts today. That inspired me to re-activate my bot @AllTimesPacific (a joke on when baseball start times were only expressed in the Eastern Time Zone) soon. It’s not active yet, so don’t suggest it, yet.

item.description:
I’m in Hamilton! https://t.co/SSXN4AQjNZ

One of the ways I can tell I’m in Hamilton is that I can breathe easy. Also, no persistent feeling of dread, like I have when I’m in Toronto.

Tonight. https://t.co/L8eJ6aG8BA

This is my first Rage Against the Machine concert since, oh boy, my university days. I lasted two songs in the mosh pit at that concert. It was a great show. Atari Teenage Riot and The Roots (who subbed in for The Wu-Tang Clan) opened.

I’m giving a thumbs up to each dude wearing a System of the Down shirt here. Three so far. SoaD fans at an RATM concert are people I want to know.

There’s a guy here wearing a DJ Shadow shirt! He must know that Run the Jewels, the opening act for RATM, has a song produced by him!

Just kidding, it’s me.

I yelled louder for “WHAT BETTER PLACE THAN HERE?! WHAT BETTER TIME THAN NOW?!” than for their more famous line.
item.source:markdown:
I’m in Hamilton! https://t.co/SSXN4AQjNZ
One of the ways I can tell I’m in Hamilton is that I can breathe easy. Also, no persistent feeling of dread, like I have when I’m in Toronto.
Tonight. https://t.co/L8eJ6aG8BA
This is my first Rage Against the Machine concert since, oh boy, my university days. I lasted two songs in the mosh pit at that concert. It was a great show. Atari Teenage Riot and The Roots (who subbed in for The Wu-Tang Clan) opened.
I’m giving a thumbs up to each dude wearing a System of the Down shirt here. Three so far. SoaD fans at an RATM concert are people I want to know.
There’s a guy here wearing a DJ Shadow shirt! He must know that Run the Jewels, the opening act for RATM, has a song produced by him!
Just kidding, it’s me.
I yelled louder for “WHAT BETTER PLACE THAN HERE?! WHAT BETTER TIME THAN NOW?!” than for their more famous line.

item.description: @rtanglao I air fry chicken pre-made tenders regularly now. It’s the main reason I bought it. I’ve also roasted broccoli and cauliflower. Fries made from scratch are on the list (though I’m trying to cut down on the potatoes in my diet).
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao I air fry chicken pre-made tenders regularly now. It’s the main reason I bought it. I’ve also roasted broccoli and cauliflower. Fries made from scratch are on the list (though I’m trying to cut down on the potatoes in my diet).
